Aaron Lewis grew up in Springfield, Vermont, listening to country music on his grandparents' 8-track tapes. Those roots inspired the founder of the multi-platinum rock band STAIND to return to his origins. After his #1 Billboard Hot Country Song debut, "Am I The Only One," and releasing two #1 Billboard Country Albums, Lewis has put a traditionalist brand ...

t: Amazon.com: State I'm In[LP]: CDs & Vinyl
s: Known for his outspokenness, impassioned live show and Outlaw Country tunes, Aaron Lewis is back with new album STATE I'M IN, the follow-up to SINNER, which went No. 1 on Billboard's Top Country Albums, Top 200 Albums, and Top Digital Albums Charts.
